page.title: 09GORING & STREATLEY GOLF CLUB
page.content:
Goring and Streatley Golf Club has some excellent facilities: Â£250000 was spent on building a new club house in 1982 with a marvellous catering service. People may come just to enjoy the view or to dine at night. Even if they are not members they can still play, paying a "Green Fee" of Â£10 per hour. The club holds 26 tournaments annually including "The Men's Medal", Mixed Open Events and National Amateur Events.
There is a total turnover of Â£300000 but it costs about Â£280000 to run the club. Several public footpaths run across the golf course from which you might see wild fowl, such as pheasants, and maybe even deer in the woods.
